page.title: 02Farming
page.content: Farming has been the main occupation in the area for generations, and is a major source of employment today. Many of the farms have been run by the same families for generations. Most of the farming families having one of three possible surnames, everybody seems to be related, however this is now slowly changing. The type of farming undertaken is dairy cows and intensive grass cultivation for feed. In the summer all the fields seem to be full of docile freesian cows, some corn is grow and like the cut grass, this to, is fed to the animals during the winter months. Chickens, free range, are kept on a number of farms mainly for use by the family. One farm breeds chickens for the local chicken factory for sale to the public.
